author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-Department 13 International Says To Place $12 Mln In Secured Convertible Notes
text:
(Corrects to add dropped word in headline)
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Department 13 International Ltd:
* ‍ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PLACEMENT OF UP TO $12 MILLION IN SECURED CONVERTIBLE NOTES WHICH CONVERT AT A$0.10 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
